name: 6th International Conference on Medicine and Surgery
content: Medicine Congress 2023 seeks to encourage, carry out, and advance interdisciplinary surgical and medical research. The goal Medicine Congress 2023 is to promote excellent research with practical applications in a setting of genuine international collaboration between scientists and engineers. Young and talented students, business representatives, and young research groups from across the world. At this international conference, surgeons from various medical specialties present their findings and interact with senior scientists to exchange ideas. Additionally, they will network with professionals from around the world, develop their management and leadership capabilities, and sharpen their research and analytical skills.
